Task list Upload New task Name Time Status Operating modify Cancel Recover Waiting Stop Running Completion of enforcement Done Running task can not be deleted
Navigation Navigation settings Save Navigation loop Return automatically Return along the paths Robot plans the route to complete the task loop when end point and starting point are not the same position Move from start point to end point and back to the start point consider as one time, suitable for smaller scenes Way turn Point turning Arc turning Reach the point then rotate, suitable for narrow scenes If the path has corners, robot calculates the turning radius to improve the efficiency, suitable for large scenes Speed down distance When the distance between robot and obstacle is less than this value, robot speeds down Stop distance When the distance between the robot and the obstacle is less than or equal to this value, robot stops Reset
Auto-charge Auto-charge Turn on Auto-charge When battery power is lower than trigger value, robot returns to autocharge Power trig autocharge Power stop autocharge
Sensor Sonar configuration When sonar is triggered in static mode, the robot will stop moving Be sure you have known the installation position before setting, the sonar value is 0 means the function is closed IMU TEMP It is recommended to set 10℃ higher than the space
